default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: It must have been a tough journey... You can relax now. That's usually my line, but this time, it looks like it's my turn to be welcomed. Where I'm from, offering a cup of coolment tea to a guest is the ultimate token of hospitality and respect. How do you welcome guests in this city?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Payment received. Enjoy your stay!

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Yes, Sunsets are the most beautiful, because for some of us, it's the last glimpse of sunlight we'll ever see.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Oh, dear, oh dear, stop fighting! At least not here!

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Haha it was a team effort. I didn't do much.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Which part went wrong? Or... They saw through me? Interesting.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Time to reap the harvest!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: The white sand... will bury it all...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Hey there! Did you rest well? Want a sip of my special cactus pick me up to refresh yourself?

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: As an inn-keeper, I've dealt with all kinds of guests. No matter where they come from, once we're under the same roof, we're pretty much like family. And when you're family, a little mutual tolerance is often all it takes to resolve most quarrels.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: I do quite enjoy tidying up rooms. It's not a difficult task and doesn't take much effort. Everything in the room must be where it should be. Especially those little surprises I've carefully prepared for my guests. They mustn't be messed up.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: The only rule in my inn is this. No fighting under this roof. Hmm? How do I get them to listen? Hehe it's nothing special. You'd know it if you'd ever been an inn-keeper for long.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: No matter how busy work gets, never skip a meal. Here, take a break and try the desert lampchuffs I've made. By the way, it seems managing the MBCC is a bit like running an inn. If you ever run into trouble, feel free to come and talk to me.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: When I was little, my parents always told me that there were no annoying desert bandits or harsh weather in Discity, and that everything would be better once we got there. But that wasn't true. It's the same everywhere. No matter where you go, the only way to protect yourself from bullies is to become stronger. Strong enough to truly find your place in the world.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: In my hometown, people love to sing and dance and drink around the campfire at night. The hardships of life never break our enthusiasm and fighting spirit. Even in the toughest times, we still laugh and sing with all our hearts. You should come with me sometime. You'll love it there.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: If you choose to be a well-behaved guest, this inn and I would treat you with all the comfort and pleasantries. But you want more than that, don't you? In that case, I'll trust you once and reveal everything I've hidden. Let me show you those less pretty things lurking in the shadows.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Let me sing you a little hometown tune. My mother used to lull me to sleep this way.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Alright, be careful. I just polished these jewelry pieces last night. They might hurt you if you are careless.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Many of my guests stare at me like this when they stay in my inn, and I see all kinds of intentions in their eyes. But why can't I see what you're thinking? Can you tell me?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Back in the desert, I was responsible for stocking my inn, so you can trust me with errands.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: While I was shopping, I noticed you might have missed a few things on your list. So I went ahead and picked them up for you. No need to thank me. It was no trouble at all.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: If you need room service, just let me know anytime.

default.title: Join Team
default.text: Ah- Oh my. I'm just a humble business owner. Why would I be needed in a fight?
